statements: SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read';
SELECT id, role_id, permission_type, permission_description FROM permissions ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT permission_description FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY permission_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_description LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_type = 'read' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, permission_description FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_permissions FROM permissions WHERE role_id = 2 GROUP BY permission_type;
SELECT id, permission_type FROM permissions WHERE role_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY id ASC, permission_type DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT role_id FROM permissions WHERE permission_description LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY role_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'user' OR role = 'editor';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = '1';
SELECT user_id, role FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'Jo%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role IN ('admin', 'moderator');
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE user_id = '2';
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT role_name, permissions FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john.doe';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name, permissions FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT username, role_id FROM users WHERE role_id = 1 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name, permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, username, email, password FROM users LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT role_name, COUNT(user_roles.user_id) AS num_users FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id GROUP BY role_name HAVING num_users > 2;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.user_id, COUNT(user_roles.role_id) AS num_roles FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY users.user_id HAVING num_roles < 3;
SELECT * FROM permissions;
SELECT user_id, feature_id, access_level FROM permissions ORDER BY user_id, feature_id DESC;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM features WHERE id = 3;
SELECT role_id, feature_id FROM role_permissions WHERE role_id = 2 ORDER BY feature_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT username, role_id FROM users WHERE id = 5;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM features WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY feature_name DESC;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.id, u.username, f.feature_name FROM permissions p JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.id JOIN features f ON p.feature_id = f.id WHERE p.access_level > 5;
